meanings.definition: Arranged in a cluster or raceme.
meanings.sent1: The racemose flowers bloomed beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The racemose arrangement of fruits made the display attractive.
meanings.sent3: The racemose pattern of clouds in the sky looked like a fluffy bouquet.
meanings.sent4: Her hair cascaded down her back in a racemose fashion, resembling a floral arrangement.
meanings.sent5: The racemose design of the necklace caught everyone's attention with its clustered gems.

meanings.sent1: The racemose branches of the tree spread out elegantly.
meanings.sent2: The racemose leaves on the plant provided a unique texture.
meanings.sent3: The racemose shadows on the ground looked like intricate lace patterns.
meanings.sent4: The racemose veins on the leaf resembled tiny branching rivers.
meanings.sent5: The racemose structure of the building's pillars added a touch of nature indoors.

meanings.definition: Resembling a raceme in form or arrangement.
meanings.sent1: The racemose pattern on the fabric gave it a floral look.
meanings.sent2: The racemose design of the chandelier created a stunning visual effect.
meanings.sent3: The racemose layout of the books on the shelf made them easy to find.
meanings.sent4: The racemose layout of the city streets made navigation confusing.
meanings.sent5: The racemose structure of the coral reef provided shelter for many sea creatures.
